publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1963 Colin Fox: Congratulations on a Progressive Victory in the US Elections—That the Parliament offers its congratulations on a progressive victory in the US elections; welcomes the re-election of Bernie Sanders to the House of Representatives for the state of Vermont; notes his re-election to Congress on a progressive democratic socialist programme for the fifth consecutive time; recognises that he is the only member of that body not aligned to the Democrat or Republican parties, and sends Congressman Sanders its warmest congratulations and hopes that his victory gives encouragement to all socially-progressive forces and peoples in the United States of America at this time.

S2M-1963 Colin Fox: Congratulations on a Progressive Victory in the US Elections—That the Parliament offers its congratulations on a progressive victory in the US elections; welcomes the re-election of Bernie Sanders to the House of Representatives for the state of Vermont; notes his re-election to Congress on a progressive democratic socialist programme for the fifth consecutive time; recognises that he is the only member of that body not aligned to the Democrat or Republican parties, and sends Congressman Sanders its warmest congratulations and hopes that his victory gives encouragement to all socially-progressive forces and peoples in the United States of America at this time. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1963 Congratulations on a Progressive Victory in the US Elections (lodged on 4 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
